data.name: FHIR Output Read
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setHeader name="CamelFhir.stringId">
        <simple trim="true">
<![CDATA[{{safe resourceById_params.stringId}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setHeader>
    <setHeader name="CamelFhir.resourceClass">
        <simple trim="true">
<![CDATA[{{safe resourceById_params.resourceClass}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setHeader>
    {{#if (ne resourceById_params.version)}}
        <setHeader name="CamelFhir.version">
            <simple trim="true">
    <![CDATA[{{safe resourceById_params.version}}]]>
            </simple>
        </setHeader>
    {{/if}}
    <to uri="fhir://{{api}}/{{method}}?serverUrl={{serverUrl}}&{{querystring fhir_params extra_query_params true}}" />
    {{#if (eq output_format "json")}}
        {{applyMarshal "fhirJson" fhir_params}}
    {{/if}}
    {{#if (eq output_format "xml")}}
        {{applyMarshal "fhirXml" fhir_params}}
    {{/if}}

    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
